channel.title: Help fixing duping~317 server!
channel.description:
Hey everyone im using a hybrid pvp v3 base and i have a dupping problem... 1- player 1 and 2 trade item 2- both accept 3- player 2 accepts 4- player 1 accepts and then clicks mini map really fast and it gives both players the item..
please help me fix this so that they cant click the minimap while trading

item.title: Help fixing duping~317 server!
item.dc:creator: @saw4 saw4
item.description:
@saw4 wrote:

you can still dupe on my server… it still lets u move while trading

Read full topic

item.title: Help fixing duping~317 server!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

put that above ‘removeAllWindows’

		if (c.inTrade) {
			return;
		}

My bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Help fixing duping~317 server!
item.dc:creator: @saw4 saw4
item.description:
@saw4 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:416840”]walking packet

if (inTrade()) { return; }[/quote]

i got this error

src\server\model\players\packets\Walking.java:92: cannot find symbol
symbol : method inTrade()
location: class server.model.players.packets.Walking
if (inTrade()) {
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
